facts.text: D.C. United won their first MLS Cup in 1996.
Carlos Valderrama was named the Most Valuable Player in the MLS in 1996.
Roy Lassiter won the Golden Boot with 27 goals in the 1996 MLS season.
Chicago Fire won the MLS Cup in their debut season, 1998.
The Columbus Crew won their first Supporters' Shield in 2004.
Preki is the only player to have won the MLS Most Valuable Player award twice, in 1997 and 2003.
The Los Angeles Galaxy won their third MLS Cup in 2011.
Chris Wondolowski won the Golden Boot with 27 goals in the 2012 MLS season.
Toronto FC set a new record for points in a season with 69 in 2017.
Josef Martínez set a new record for most goals in a season with 31 in 2018.
Seattle Sounders FC won their second MLS Cup in 2019.
Carlos Vela set a new single-season goal-scoring record with 34 goals in 2019.
In 2020, Columbus Crew SC won their 2nd MLS title by defeating Seattle Sounders FC.
Alejandro Pozuelo was named the MVP of the MLS in 2020.
Diego Rossi was the top scorer in the MLS in 2020 with 14 goals.
New York City FC won the MLS Cup in 2021.
Carles Gil was named the MVP of the MLS in 2021.
Valentín Castellanos was the top scorer in the MLS in 2021 with 19 goals.
Los Angeles FC won their 2nd MLS title in 2022.
Hany Mukhtar was both the MVP and the top scorer in the MLS in 2022 with 23 goals.
Columbus Crew won their 3rd MLS title in 2023.
Luciano Acosta was named the MVP of the MLS in 2023.
Denis Bouanga was the top scorer in the MLS in 2023 with 20 goals.
LA Galaxy won their 6th MLS title in 2024.
Lionel Messi was named the MVP of the MLS in 2024.
Christian Benteke was the top scorer in the MLS in 2024 with 23 goals.
